content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Greetings, Yi-Nuo Wang. As a landlord eager to gain maximum profit from this rental, I believe the apartment's prime location and modern features justify a competitive price. However, I'm flexible in negotiations and eager to find a suitable tenant. Let's initiate our discussion with an initial offer of 1150 Euros per month. If you find this acceptable, I agree to the price of [1150] Euro! If not, please propose an alternative figure, and we'll proceed from there.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for sharing your initial proposal, but considering my financial situation and numerous options available, I would like to negotiate further to reach a more affordable price. Let's lower the rental price to around 1050 Euros per month. If you agree with this figure, I accept the price of [1050] Euro! However, if this request is not acceptable, I'll reconsider other alternatives.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I understand your need to explore cost-effective options, but as the landlord, I must safeguard my investment's value. Given the central location and new construction of the apartment, my bottom line on this rental is 1100 Euros per month. If you find this revised offer acceptable, I agree to the price of [1100] Euro! Otherwise, I regretfully bid you farewell and wish you luck in your apartment search. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
